title: Iman Shumpert, Big Bank & DJ Scream - Politics As Usual
itunes:title: Iman Shumpert, Big Bank & DJ Scream - Politics As Usual
description:
The Big Facts crew discuss bad record contracts, staying humble in the midst of fame and social media pressure. They also welcome NBA star and rapper Iman Shumpert to the show. Iman discusses his new music, NBA politics, his wife Teyana Taylor and more!
